result.name: Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection vulnerabilities in XRMS

nvt.name: Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection vulnerabilities in XRMS
nvt.tags: cvss_base_vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:N/I:P/A:N|solution=No solution or patch was made available for at least one year since disclosure of this vulnerability. Likely none will be provided anymore. General solution options are to upgrade to a newer release, disable respective features, remove the product or replace the product by another one. |summary=XRMS is a web-based application for managing business entities such as employees, customers, contacts, activities. The application is vulnerable to simple Cross Site Scripting, which can be used for several isues.|solution_type=WillNotFix|qod_type=remote_app
